mapper.select: SELECT t.number number, t.name name, t.sex sex, t.tel tel, t.email email, t.img_path img FROM admin t WHERE t.state='1' AND t.number=#{number}

SELECT c.name college, t.number number, t.name name, t.sex sex, t.tel tel, t.email email, t.img_path img FROM teacher t left join college c on t.college_code=c.code WHERE t.state='1' and c.state='1' and t.number=#{number}

SELECT co.name college, cl.name major, stu.clazz_number clazz, stu.number number, stu.name name, stu.sex sex, stu.tel tel, stu.email email, stu.img_path img FROM student stu left join clazz cl on stu.clazz_number=cl.number left join college co on cl.college_code=co.code WHERE stu.state='1' and cl.state='1' and co.state='1' and stu.number=#{number}
